title: I'm afraid...
text: ...of exams! I'm stressed and in panic! How to get rid of bad thoughts that appear in my head? I know EVERYTHING WILL BE OKAY, but I'm so scared of tomorrow's exams... I will do it! Keep calm and just do it!
author: Katty
